entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
